These supreme pictures were taken in my palace and my god they look champion don’t they!!

Nike Air Max 97 OG SILVER BULLET ☄️✨

Size UK8.5, selling as they are too small for me now. I have worn these quite a lot but they’re in very good condition for their age because they’ve been well loved. There is some yellowing to the white plastic of the lower and a couple minor scratches on the reflective upper (pics 2&4) but nothing hugely major, just general wear and tear. They have plenty of life left in them!

NOT GOING LOWER THAN SALE PRICE STOP ASKING, CHECK GOAT FOR USED 10.5 I'M ALREADY FAR BELOW THEM

Nike Air Max 97 "Silver Bullet" Size 10.5

Worn Condition. No OG box. Has scuffs, dirt and paint cracking. Air bubble is sturdy and perfectly wearable.
